infinitepower18/WSA-Sideloader

Installs Android files on Windows

View on index

Related repos

  • TUI file manager for Android Debug Bridge
  • Transfers files between Android and Linux or macOS
  • Sideloads apps to iOS devices without a computer
  • Installs Linux distributions on Android devices
  • Run a Linux distribution on Android
  • Streamlines Windows installations, debloats, and tweaks
  • Creates bootable Windows USBs on macOS
  • Single-file backend for quick app setups and simple APIs
  • Android app for wireless and hardware security testing, inspired by Flipper Zero
